<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Divine Health](/Feats.aspx?ID=5893) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 94 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your faith makes you resistant to disease, protecting you as you offer succor to the ill. You gain a +2 status bonus to saves against [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=578) and [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) and to flat checks to recover from [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). Allies in your champion's aura get this benefit, but their bonus is +1.

 In addition, if you roll a success on a save against a disease or poison, you get a critical success instead. (Your allies don't share this benefit.) If you have the sacred body class feature, when you roll a critical failure on a save against a disease or poison, you get a failure instead.
name: Divine Health
